verbose_text: Hexokinase 1 (HK1), an important protein to coordinate glycolysis and oxidative phosphorylation, was also found to inhibit cell apoptosis by modulating Bax, Bak and Bad XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Hexokinase 1 (HK1), an important protein to coordinate glycolysis and oxidative phosphorylation, was also found to inhibit cell apoptosis by modulating Bax
